attributes.review: i was baby sitting my little cousin when they suddenly disappeared! i opened my phone to print missing signs and call my aunt and uncle but i accidentally opened the trump app. when i did, i saw my little cousin stuck in trumps arms! my cousin was struggling so much and i sadly couldn’t retrieve her. rip fiona
